description:
Works to trees protected by a TPO
T1: Mature Sycamore: Approximately 17.00m: Top L/H corner of garden: Reduce height by approximately 2.00m-2.50m. Reduce extraneous overlong lateral and sub lateral branches back into main crown structure whilst maintaining a naturally flowing crown line up to 2.00m where required. Thin crown density by approximately 25%. Remove dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.
T3: Sycamore: Approximately 16.00m: Right hand corner of main garden: Thin crown density by 25%. Reduce overlong extraneous branches back into main crown structure where appropriate, up to 2.00m where required. Remove dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.
(All other tree works will be considered under a Section 211 Notice, reference CON/2022/0416)
